features: Durable Materail: Monitor memo board is made of transparent acrylic material, durable, simple and stylish,light weight, easy to use,not easy to fall off or break. Monitor memo board is easy to fit, just tear off the sticker and hang it on the edges of both sides of the monitor screen.Notice: Please stick the memo message board on the computer frame instead of the computer screen to avoid damage to the screen.

Product Size: Computer monitors message board size is 11x3x0.05inch, suitable for most computer monitor. Note holder for monitor simply peels off the sticker and hang it over the edge of the monitor screen of either side to use.Please check the dimension of your computer before your purchase.

Convenience: The package include a pair of monitor memo board, one on each side.Monitor message board can keep clears your desk space up,simple and convenience.Suitable for using in the office,keeps your organized at work.The perfect gift for a classmate, friend, family member, colleague or relative

Wide Application: The monitor memo board is suitable for home, office, bringing convenience to your life.can be organize important things,meeting time,planing note.monitor memo board to meet your daily needs in the office and at home.The note record is clear at a glance, and you can see it at any time.

Easy To Use: You need to tears off the computer side panel memo surface protective film, wipe the dust on the edge of the computer monitor,3M adhesive tapes on back of the Monitor memo board, just peel and stick on the sides of your computer monitor, and done

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and good adhesive
reviews.reviewText: The quality of the T&G Monitor Memory Board is far greater than I expected for the price. It is sturdy plastic with a good adhesive strip. The purchase comes with two, so I may be using the other on my second monitor or give it to my spouse. No more moving sticky notes around on my monitors!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for office job
reviews.reviewText: Got these for my desk at work. Love them. Plan on getting more. Make sure your monitor has an edge to it or it will not stick. If it does, you are good to go! They have stuck perfectly and have not fallen off. Definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'll edit this review later for the photo, but the two-pack is what I ordered. One of the best ones I've ever owned, and I've owned about 7 different kinds of Monitor Memo Boards. They're simply fantastic, great hold, clean, and firm. I've also tested out the sticky note stick, magnet stick, paper clips, and dry erase markers on them as well as using it for a phone stand, charger fits right in through the bottom. The clip itself on the memo board is STRONG. Strong enough to hold one piece of paper and easy enough to slide 8 or more pieces of paper in-between it. I haven't tested out how many pieces of paper but at least eight. I hope this review helps people decide and if there's any questions, I could answer for anybody just let me know. 5 of 5 stars on all levels.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Strong adhesive. Have to put a good bit of force on them to remove. I didn't have the excess frame around the front of my computer to apply them so I had to attach them to the back of my computer instead which is why they are backwards but they still do the job. I use them to place sticky motes that have my assignments and their due dates so I don't miss an assignment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pay attention to the size of your monitor
reviews.reviewText: If the monitor is wide enough to fit these on there then it's perfect. If not and you put it on there and try to take it off it can damage your monitor so please pay attention to the size of your monitor

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for a laptop

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect for monitor
reviews.reviewText: This is perfect for a monitor and for working at home with lots of activity going on. It is sturdy and very useful, would definitely recommend to friends and family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So simple a concept why did I not think of it.Love it so much I bought two more, one for other computer and one for work computer.Will invest in more later I am sure.Computer screens do not have the places to post post its like the old CRTs did. Great idea.
